data.eml:eml: Description and morphology of the " Juan de Fuca vent mussel ", Benthomodioluserebus sp. n. (Bivalvia, Mytilidae, Bathymodiolinae): " Phylogenetically basal but morphologically advanced "

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliver, P. Graham (2015): Description and morphology of the " Juan de Fuca vent mussel ", Benthomodioluserebus sp. n. (Bivalvia, Mytilidae, Bathymodiolinae): " Phylogenetically basal but morphologically advanced ". Zoosystematics and Evolution 91 (2): 151-165, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.91.5417, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.91.5417
